title: Pixel 3xl does not charge but shows 0% and turns for a brief moment before shutting down
content:
I've tried a couple different chargers, cables, and outlets as well as the original pixel charger. When plugged in the phone will show the battery/lightning bolt symbol and then show 0% with the rotating circles but does not charge past 0%. I can turn the phone on at 0% but it immediately turns off even while plugged in.

A couple days prior to the android 11 update my pixel was shutting down immediately once it reached the percentage that turned on battery saver. It did the same a couple hours ago and no longer charges. 

Would I be correct in assuming that the battery has failed? If so, is this covered under warranty (I bought it through my verizon plan).
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
